# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O common-services-auth-1.0.0.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1084/org/openo/common-services/auth/auth-service-deployment/1.0.0/auth-service-deployment-1.0.0.zip && unzip -q -o -B common-services-auth-1.0.0.zip && rm -f common-services-auth-1.0.0.zip
EXPOSE 8102
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0 autorelease-1084 > OPENO_VERSION
